content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> "The last dandelion" what do you think about that caption?

Using a title like "The Last Dandelion" adds a sense of poignancy and finality to the droodle, inviting viewers to consider themes of beauty, transience, and nostalgia, which can enhance the emotional depth of the image. This approach can stimulate a richer discussion about the intended meaning of the drawing and inspire further titles that evoke similar reflections.
